pages.text: A soul-bound javelin of exceptional power. The Bound Pilum is a superior version of the standard $(l:animus:items/pilum)Pilum$() that deals AOE damage even with melee attacks!

Created using an Alchemy Array. Right-click $(item)Arcane Ash$() on the ground to create the array, then right-click a $(item)Binding Reagent$() into it, followed by a $(item)Diamond Pilum$(). The weapon will be bound to your spirit.

pages.title: Abilities
pages.text: $(bold)Melee AOE:$()$(br)Unlike regular Pilums, the Bound Pilum deals area damage with $(bold)both$() melee and ranged attacks!$(br2)$(bold)Thrown Attack:$()$(br)Hold right-click to charge, release to throw. Deals AOE damage where it lands.$(br2)$(bold)Melee Attack:$()$(br)Left-click to strike enemies in an area around your target.

pages.title: Advantages
pages.text: $(bold)Bound Weapon:$()$(li)Consumes LP instead of durability$(li)Never breaks$(li)AOE on all attacks$(li)Soul-bound to you$(br2)Perfect for combat against groups of enemies!$(br2)$(italic)Bound to your soul, unbreakable in battle.$()
